experiences.title: Undergraduate Student Researcher @ [Cornell University Artificial Intelligence](https://cuai.github.io)
experiences.subtitle: Machine Learning Research and Education
experiences.summary: Researching paraphrase detection and generation (NLP) as well as zero-shot image classification (Computer Vision).

experiences.title: Co-op on Machine Learning Team @ [Ada Support](https://ada.cx)
experiences.subtitle: Improved multilingual understanding for Ada's AI chatbots
experiences.summary: Increased valuable customer interactions by enabling Ada chatbots to better understand non-English languages. Collaboratively developed and trained multilingual models using state-of-the-art architectures.

experiences.title: lecture2notes
experiences.subtitle: Summarizing Lecture Videos by Classifying Slides and Analyzing Text
experiences.summary: Conducted scientific research & created a state-of-the-art system to summarize classroom lectures using machine learning, computer vision, and NLP. More info on [the project page](/projects/lecture2notes/).

experiences.title: TransformerSum
experiences.subtitle: Open-Source Neural Summarization Library
experiences.summary: Furthered research in neural-network text summarization models, specifically in less researched areas such as long document summarization. 4.45x smaller than state-of-the-art but 94% as accurate. High code quality and thoroughly documented. More info on [the project page](/projects/transformersum/).

experiences.title: PicoCTF 2019 & 2021
experiences.subtitle: Cybersecurity Challenges
experiences.summary: Placed 609 out of 15,817 during the [2019 competition](/projects/picoctf-2019/) and later completed all 121 challenges. During the [2021 competition](/projects/picoctf-2021/), placed 25 out of 2280 (top 1.1%) among US Middle/High School students. Learned ethical hacking skills including cryptography, forensics, reverse engineering, and binary exploitation.

experiences.title: Fast.ai
experiences.subtitle: Deep Learning Fundamentals
experiences.summary: Completed parts one and two. Developed an understanding for advanced deep learning concepts by building several near state-of-the-art models and writing many machine learning functions from scratch. Built [AI Respiratory Doctor](https://haydenhousen.com/projects/ai-respiratory-doctor/).

experiences.title: Johns Hopkins Center for Talented Youth (CTY)
experiences.summary: Completed “Introduction to Java” and “Advanced Java” courses. I also took AP Computer Science A through CTY.

experiences.title: FreeCodeCamp
experiences.subtitle: Awarded Front End Development Certificate
experiences.summary: Completed about 400 hours of coursework. Built 10 front-end projects ([available on CodePen](https://codepen.io/collection/DyVKZM)). Completed 347 coding challenges.

experiences.title: Various Online Computer Courses
experiences.subtitle: Lynda.com/Udacity/CodeCademy
experiences.summary:
Lynda.com: 19 courses completed including the “Programming Foundations” series by Simon Allardice

Udacity: Completed several courses about JavaScript, Android, Web Design, and Networking

CodeCademy: Completed various tutorials involving basic web development
